text:
June 14, 1957
Mrs* Marshall P# Smith
Assistant to the Director
Cooperative Test Division
Educational Testing Service
twenty Nassau Street
Princetonf New Jersey
Dear Mrs* Smith:
Tour inquiry to Mr* Kostka has been referred to me.
I shall be most happy to add your name to our NAEB
TV Pact Sheet Service Bulletin Mailing %ist. The
charge for this subscription is $2*50 per year. The
Pact Sheets are distributed at irregular intervals
and by joining now, you will receive all the issues
which have been printed since January 1, 1957# Your
subscription would therefore expire on January 1, 1958.
Igfccn you return the enclosed postal card, confirming
the fact that you wish to receive the Pact Sheets, we %
will place your name on our list, and bill you.
Sincerely,
(Mrs.)Judith B, Gans
Secretary
Enclosure
t
